title: Trump's Lawyer Leading Aggressive Counterattacks
itunes:title: Trump's Lawyer Leading Aggressive Counterattacks
description:
Erik Larson, Bloomberg Legal Reporter, discusses his profile of Alina Habba, the lawyer who has taken over some of Donald Trump’s highest priority legal fights, and his conversation with the former president.

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
